article_title: After The Supreme Court's Decision, How To Improve On The Affordable Care Act

article_metadata.description: The Supreme Court’s June 25 decision in King v. Burwell preserves federal health care subsidies under the Affordable Care Act (ACA) for Americans who reside in states that have opted not to create their own health insurance exchanges. In so doing, it removes an immediate uncertainty for those who would [...]
article_metadata.author: Ron Williams
